episode: I heard that a coworker was talking bad about me to my boss and colleagues. Now I don't know who I can trust or talk to at work.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I heard that a coworker was talking bad about me to my boss and colleagues. Now I don't know who I can trust or talk to at work.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. It's tough when trust is broken. Have you considered having a chat with your boss to clear things up?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I want to but at the same time I don't want to come off as bitchy. I'm the only female that works in the kitchen with a dozen guys.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand. It's a tricky situation, but staying true to yourself is key. Maybe approach it calmly and just express your feelings.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I want to but I'm very apprehensive at the moment. I don't know all that was said and I don't want to overreact.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Take your time. Maybe gather more info first, then decide on your next steps.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's really sad that I can't trust my coworkers. Work should be a comfortable place.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's truly a shame. Everyone deserves a supportive work environment.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm usually well-liked. Most of my friends are guys and I've never had problems relating with them before.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really rough. Maybe it's just a misunderstanding.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I don't know. I know that this week is going to be really uncomfortable for me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Hang in there. You got this.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I don't like not being able to trust people. Now I'm kind of afraid to ask for help.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's understandable. Just be careful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm trying. I don't want to appear upset and make more of an issue out of it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're wise to stay composed.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's all I really can do. I didn't expect misogyny.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. It's so unfair.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It might also be that I'm older than everyone else. My boss is the same age as me but the guys in the kitchen are all in their 20s

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Age shouldn't matter. Keep being you.
